mapper.select: SELECT substr(ub.login_email, 1, instr(ub.login_email, '@') - 1) AS login_email, ub.board_no, ub.board_title, ub.board_content, replace(substr(ub.create_date, 6, 5), '-', '.') AS create_date, ub.board_hit, ub.user_type, COALESCE(ubl.like_count, 0) AS board_like_count FROM notice_board ub LEFT JOIN (SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM notice_board_like GROUP BY board_no) ubl ON ub.board_no = ubl.board_no ORDER BY ub.board_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into notice_BOARD(login_email, board_title, board_content, board_hit) select #{login_email},#{board_title},#{board_content},0
mapper.select: SELECT ub.board_no, ub.login_email, ub.board_title, ub.board_content, ub.create_date, ub.board_hit, COALESCE(ubl.like_count, 0) AS board_like_count FROM notice_BOARD ub LEFT JOIN ( SELECT board_no, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM notice_board_like GROUP BY board_no ) ubl ON ub.board_no = ubl.board_no WHERE ub.board_no = #{board_no}
select board_no, login_email, board_title, board_content, create_date, board_hit from notice_BOARD where board_no=#{board_no}
